Reviews.Title: Equipo similar  al Galaxy S-3
Reviews.Author: Gremoroz
Reviews.Content: uyy buen equipo ,no tiene nada que envidiarle al Samsung galaxy S3, buena camara, navega muy bien por internet,tiene el GPS no hubo necesidad de instaslarlo

ProductInfo.Features:
5.3 inch huge display HD (960*540) and super slim smartphone/mini pocket tablet pc all in one
Latest MTK6577 1GHz dual core Cortex A9 + GPU Power SGX531 + 1GB RAM + 4GB ROM High sensitive capacitive 5 point multi touch screen
Android 4.0 ice cream sandwich OS, compatible with thousands of apps from google play
3G + WIFI for high speed internet Dual SIM Dual Standby Build in GPS (navigation software is not included)
Support external memory card up to 32GB Bluetooth handsfree calling Dual camera, 8MP with flash light
ProductInfo.Name: Hero H9500 - 5.3 inch QHD (960*540) 1GHz dual core MTK6577 CPU, 1GB RAM android 4.0 Ice cream sandwich 3G tablet phone dual sim 8MP WIFI GPS (3264*2448 HD photo capturing, 1080P video recording) (dark blue, white)
